Package fr.cotedazur.univ.polytech.model.deck

Class Deck<T extends Enum<T>>

java.lang.Object
fr.cotedazur.univ.polytech.model.deck.Deck<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of cards in the deck
public class Deck<T extends Enum<T>> extends Object
The Deck class represents a generic deck of cards. It provides methods for adding, removing, and shuffling cards in the deck.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck()
    Constructs an empty deck.
    Deck(List<T> cards)
    Constructs a deck with the given list of cards.
